text: EXPRESSION EVALUATION SELECT R.id, S.cdate The DBMS represents a clause FROM R JOIN S as an expression tree. ON R.id = S.id B ; WHERE S.value > 100 l'he nodes in the tree represent different expression types: — Comparisons (=, <, >, ! =) — Conjunction (AND), Disjunction (OR) — Arithmetic Operators (+, -, *, /, %) — Constant Values — Tuple Attribute References == CMU-DB ; 1 vavait Ÿ Z IM D DI % 5427/1:0537 - EXPRESSION EVALUATION > »s 8 Y w O. 12 - Query Execution | (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
